name: com.unity.services.cloudsave
description:
Build better player experiences with seamless game data stored securely in the cloud.

Use Cloud Save to store your players’ progress and preferences, by doing so you can share this data between all the players’ devices and any game backend services.

samples.description: Example script demonstrating the Cloud Save package.

_upm.changelog:
### Added
* An optional `RequestTimeout` parameter to `ServiceOptions`, which will be considered when uploading files for a player using the `SaveAsync` methods in the `FilesService`.

### Fixed
* Fixed bug with after value when retrieving all files for a player.
